joinNowPage.subTitle: MyACUVUE®
joinNowPage.body.paragraph1: Collect points with ACUVUE® contact lenses. Redeem rewards exclusive to members.
registrationPage.validations.ageThreshol: MyACUVUE is only available for Australians aged 16 or above.
validation.otp.any.invalid: You have entered an invalid OTP, please try again.
completeYourProfilePage.messaging: Your email has been verified. Complete your profile below so we can tailor the MyACUVUE® experience and offers to you.
completeYourProfileForm.form.marketingPr: Don’t miss out on the latest offers and updates from ACUVUE®! Select how you want to hear from us.
dashboardPage.membershipDetails.benefits: Points with the purchase of ACUVUE® contact lenses from your Preferred Optical Store.
profilePage.registrationSuccessDialogBod: But first, you need to select your Preferred Optical Store before your reward is issued to your account.
